title: BUscience
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Gorilla study reveals complex pros and cons of friendship
items.description: Friendship comes with complex pros and cons -- possibly explaining why some individuals are less sociable, according to a new study of gorillas.

items.title: Black tea and berries could contribute to healthier aging
items.description: Higher intakes of black tea, berries, citrus fruits and apples could help to promote healthy aging, new research has found.

items.title: Biological particles may be crucial for inducing heavy rain

items.title: New study informs fire prevention strategies to save lives and property

items.title: Ancient Andes society used hallucinogens to strengthen social order
items.description: Snuff tubes uncovered at Chavin de Huantar in Peru reveal how leaders used mystical experiences to cement their power.
